title: BRIEF-Container Corporation Of India Posts Sept Quarter Loss
text:
BRIEF-Container Corporation Of India Posts Sept Quarter Loss

Stock Markets 30 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 19:36)

BRIEF-Container Corporation Of India Posts Sept Quarter Loss Oct 30 (Reuters) - Container Corporation of India Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER LOSS AFTER TAX 3.22 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 3.36 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR SEPT QUARTER PROFIT WAS 2.74 BILLION RUPEES * SEPT QUARTER REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 17.39 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 18.22 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR * SEPT QUARTER EXCEPTIONAL ITEM 8.61 BILLION RUPEES

BRIEF-Container Corporation Of India Posts Sept Quarter Loss
description: BRIEF-Container Corporation Of India Posts Sept Quarter Loss
